description.en:
The course develops an in-depth understanding of the nature of the non-contentious proceedings, the procedural principles, and the various non-contentious matters.
It will also provide the requisite skills for the commencement of the relevant proceedings, the adjudication of the case, the participation in the proceedings, and the presentation, gathering and assessment of facts and evidence by the judge, the petitioner, the interested party and third parties involved in the case.
Students will learn how to submit and defend their opinions grounded in substantive law by means of drafting a written statement and a court order as well as conducting an oral exercise by simulating a hearing. Students will also become briefly acquainted with the possibilities of appealing against a judgment rendered in a non-contentious matter. In addition, a basic understanding of the e-file system and its uses will be acquired.
description.et:
Õpitakse süvendatult tundma hagita menetluse olemust, menetluspõhimõtteid ja hagita menetluse erinevaid liike.
Samuti omandatakse hagita menetluse algatamiseks, hagita asja läbivaatamiseks, menetluses osalemiseks ning asjaolude ja tõendite esitamiseks, kogumiseks ning hindamiseks vajalikke oskusi vastavalt kohtuniku, avaldaja, puudutatud isiku ja menetlusse kaasatud kolmandate isikute seisukohast.
Õpitakse esitama ja kaitsma oma materiaalõigusel põhinevaid seisukohti avalduse ja määruse koostamise ülesande abil kirjalikult ja kohtuistungit jäljendaval harjutusistungil suuliselt. Samuti tutvutakse põgusalt hagita menetluses tehtud lahendi edasikaebamise võimalustega. Lisaks omandatakse algtasemel ettekujutus e-toimiku tähendusest ja selle kasutusvõimalustest.

objectives.en: Firstly, the course aims to provide in-depth knowledge of civil procedure in the context of non-contentious proceedings (also known as action-by-petition proceedings) together with the required practical skills for participating in such proceedings, including drafting procedural documents.
objectives.et: Kursuse esimene eesmärk on anda süvendatud teadmised tsiviilkohtumenetlusest hagita menetlust puudutavas osas ja praktilised oskused hagita menetluses osalemiseks, sh menetlusdokumentide koostamiseks.

objectives.en: The second objective of the course is to teach how to link substantive and procedural law, by reviewing and consolidating the student's knowledge and skills in the general part of civil law, property, company, family law and law of succession.
objectives.et: Kursuse teine eesmärk on õpetada seostama materiaalõigust ja menetlusõigust, korrates ja kinnistades üliõpilase teadmisi ja oskusi tsiviilõiguse üldosast, asja-, ühingu-, perekonna- ja pärimisõigusest.

learning_outcomes.en: have acquired comprehensive knowledge of the purpose of the non-contentious procedure and its main differences with the general action-by-claim procedure
learning_outcomes.et: Teab hagita menetluse otstarvet ja erisusi võrreldes hagimenetlusega

learning_outcomes.en: are familiar with the nature and principles of the non-contentious procedure
learning_outcomes.et: Tunneb hagita menetluse olemust ja põhimõtteid

learning_outcomes.en: are able to interpret the rules of civil procedure as well as the legal norms governing actions by claim and the non-contentious procedure, and to determine which of these rules is to be applied in a particular case as a general rule (lex generalis) and which as a special rule (lex specialis)
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab tõlgendada tsiviilkohtumenetlusnorme ja hagimenetluse ning hagita menetlust reguleerivaid õigusnorme ja määratleda, millist normi tuleb konkreetsel juhul kohaldada üldnormina ja millist erinormina

learning_outcomes.en: are familiar with the types of non-contentious matters and the rules of procedure applicable to them
learning_outcomes.et: Tunneb hagita menetluse liike ja menetlusreegleid

learning_outcomes.en: can establish links between substantive law and procedural law in the context of non-contentious proceedings
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab seostada materiaalõigust menetlusõigusega hagita menetluses vajalikus ulatuses

learning_outcomes.en: are familiar with the principles of drafting relevant procedural documents and can draft the most basic ones on their own
learning_outcomes.et: Tunneb menetlusdokumentide koostamise põhimõtteid ja oskab koostada lihtsamaid menetlusdokumente algtasemel

learning_outcomes.en: are able to present and defend their positions both in written procedural documents and orally at a hearing
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab esitada ja kaitsta oma seisukohti nii kirjalikult menetlusdokumentides kui ka suuliselt kohtuistungil

learning_outcomes.en: are able to present and defend their positions both in written procedural documents and orally at a hearing
learning_outcomes.et: Omab ettekujutust e-toimiku tähendusest ja kasutusvõimalustest
